# pixelAspectRatio

**Instance Property**

The aspect ratio of a single pixel.

## Declaration

```swift
var pixelAspectRatio: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

The aspect ratio is defined as `x/y`, where `x` is the width of the pixel and `y` is the height of the pixel.

## Accessing the screen mode attributes

- **size**: The screen size, measured in pixels.

items.description: The screen size, measured in pixels.
